content: Go right at the fork in the road. Once you reach a large gate, take out the Worm Practitioner and look for a **Treasure Chest** it was guarding on the left before continuing to the next area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
Go right at the fork in the road. Once you reach a large gate, take out the Worm Practitioner and look for a **Treasure Chest** it was guarding on the left before continuing to the next area.
